name: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskState
desc: The state of the task associated with the recognition request.

items.name: case canceling
items.desc: Delivery of recognition results has finished, but audio recording may be ongoing.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: Delivery of recognition requests has finished and audio recording has stopped.

items.name: case finishing
items.desc: Audio recording has stopped, but delivery of recognition results may continue.

items.name: case running
items.desc: Speech recognition (potentially including audio recording) is in progress.

items.name: case starting
items.desc: Speech recognition (potentially including audio recording) has not yet started.
